code: import{GET_PLAYERS,ADD_PLAYER,DELETE_PLAYERS,UPDATE_USERNAME,DARE_PLAYER,RESET_PLAYER,DELETE_PLAYER}from'./types';export var getPlayers=function getPlayers(){return{type:GET_PLAYERS};};export var addPlayer=function addPlayer(){return{type:ADD_PLAYER};};export var deletePlayers=function deletePlayers(){return{type:DELETE_PLAYERS};};export var updateUsername=function updateUsername(value,id){return{type:UPDATE_USERNAME,payload:{value:value,id:id}};};export var darePlayer=function darePlayer(id){return{type:DARE_PLAYER,payload:id};};export var resetPlayer=function resetPlayer(id){return{type:RESET_PLAYER,payload:id};};export var deletePlayer=function deletePlayer(id){return{type:DELETE_PLAYER,payload:id};};
